means: 前进(advance的过去式和过去分词)

sentence.Network_en: The way Swedes integrate immigrants is, she feels, 100% more advanced.
sentence.Network_cn: 她觉得瑞典人帮助移民适应当地生活的方式百分百地更为先进。

sentence.Network_en: The gentleman, despite his advanced years, helped Kathryn back to her seat.
sentence.Network_cn: 这位绅士，尽管年事已高，仍然帮着凯瑟琳回到座位上。

sentence.Network_en: The demonstrators fled when soldiers toting machine guns advanced on the crowd.
sentence.Network_cn: 当持有机枪的士兵向人群进逼时，示威者逃散了。

entry.def: An advanced system, method, or design is modern and has been developed from an earlier version of the same thing.

example.ex: Without more training or advanced technical skills, they'll lose their jobs.
example.tran: 没有进一步的培训或高级技能的话，他们就会丢掉工作。

example.ex: ...the most advanced optical telescope in the world.
example.tran: 世界上最先进的光学望远镜

entry.def: A country that is advanced has reached a high level of industrial or technological development.

entry.tran: （学生）程度高的；（课程）高级的，高等的
entry.def: An advanced student has already learned the basic facts of a subject and is doing more difficult work. An advanced course of study is designed for such students.

example.ex: The course is suitable for beginners and advanced students...
example.tran: 本课程适合初学者及程度较高者。

example.ex: The lab has recently been updated to allow for more advanced courses.
example.tran: 实验室最近经过更新，可以上更高阶的课程了。

entry.def: Something that is at an advanced stage or level is at a late stage of development.

example.ex: 'Medicare' is available to victims of advanced kidney disease...
example.tran: 老年医疗保险也适用于肾病晚期患者。

example.ex: His ideas should be more advanced by the time the Committee meets in Edinburgh in October.
example.tran: 到委员会10月份在爱丁堡开会时，他的观点应该更为成熟了。

entry.def: If you say that someone is of advanced years or is advanced in age, you are saying in a polite way that they are old.

example.ex: The gentleman, despite his advanced years, helped Kathryn back to her seat.
example.tran: 这位绅士，尽管年事已高，仍然帮着凯瑟琳回到座位上。

means.word_mean: 1. farther along in physical or mental development;

sentences.sentence: "the child's skeletal age was classified as `advanced'"
"children in the advanced classes in elementary school read far above grade average"

means.word_mean: 2. comparatively late in a course of development;

sentences.sentence: "the illness had reached an advanced stage"

means.word_mean: 4. at a higher level in training or knowledge or skill;

sentences.sentence: "special seminars for small groups of advanced students at the University"

means.word_mean: 5. ahead in development; complex or intricate;
7. (of societies) highly developed especially in technology or industry;

sentences.sentence: "at that time the most advanced outpost was still east of the Rockies"

auth_sentence.content: You can't compare this to an advanced diagnosis.

auth_sentence.res_content: String quintessence and the formulation of advanced quantum gravity.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 高级的, 年老的, 先进的
stems_affixes.word_buile: advance[n.&v.前进, 提升]+ed表形容词→adj.高级的, 年老的, 先进的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 渐消失的, 易消散的, 会凋零的
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+van空+escent开始……的→开始空出去的→渐消失的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 徒然的, 无益的, 虚荣的, 空虚的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vain=van空→adj.徒然的, 无益的, 虚荣的, 空虚的
van空+ity表名词→心里空空→虚荣心

stems_affixes.value_cn: 逐渐消失, 容易消失, 幻灭, 瞬息
stems_affixes.word_buile: e出+van空+escency开始→开始空出去→渐消失
ad向+van前卫,先锋+ce→n.&v.前进, 提升

Sentence.sentence: Useful thinking skills for advanced academic research.
Instead he was keenly interested in product design and aesthetics （美学）, and in making advanced technology simple to use.
As sisters and brothers advanced into old age, closeness increases and rivalry diminishes, explains VC, a psychologist at Purdue University.
It is essential to advanced manufacturing.

In a division of electronic engineers, who were designing equipments so advanced that they work in teams of up to 150, co-workers and managers were asked to nominate the standouts- the stars in productivity and effectiveness

sentences.en: His ideas are advanced, and only a few people could understand him.
sentences.cn: 他的思想是先进的, 只有少数人能理解他。

sentences.en: They're going to start an advanced course in English at that institute.
sentences.cn: 那个学院要开一个英语高级班。

jushi.english: She died in an advanced age.
He was suffering from cancer which had already reached an advanced stage.
jushi.chinese: 他的癌症已经到了晚期。

jushi.english: We should learn their advanced experience in management from them.
jushi.chinese: 我们应该学习他们先进的管理经验。
